Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Sterling by Music Man AX3S-BK-R1 Axis in Black with White Body Binding - Used Sterling 6 String Electric Guitar in Black with White Body Binding - Used - Description An original, classic design that is familiar to all fans of great guitars, the AX3 traces its roots to the Music Man Axis, the venerable single cutaway guitar that took the scene by storm in the early 90’s. The Sterling by Music Man Axis features a 5-way selector, asymmetrical neck, and vintage style tremolo. Classic, Attractive Body Lines An original, classic design, the AX3 traces its' roots to the Music Man Axis, the venerable single cutaway guitar that took the scene by storm in the early 90's. Affordable Yet Amazing A dual Humbucker pickup configuration with 5 way switching, and Tone/Volume controls give the AX3 a tremendous versatility and value at an incredible price point. Fully Adjustable Fulcrum Tremolo The vintage style tremolo bridge has a comfortable area to rest your palm on, and the solid saddles offer adjustments for height and intonation.
